DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the DLT, MTD and recommended Phase II dose of ixabepilone in Japanese patients with solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Ixabepilone (BMS-247550) in Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: 20 years or older Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of adenocarcinoma Solid tumors Patients with an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) of â‰¥2
